bibl.title: Greek and Latin Papyri, Ostraca and Wooden Tablets in the Collection of the Brooklyn Museum. (Papyrologica Florentina. XXII.)
bibl.note: P. Brooklyn (O. Brooklyn) 1-184: Papyri (1-26); - Schoolboys' Tablets (27-31); - Ostraca (32-87); - Papyri Published in Other Editions (88-91); - Descriptions of Papyri (92-115) and Ostraca (116-184). - Additions and Corrections to O. Wilb.
bibl.seg: SHELTON John C., Greek and Latin Papyri, Ostraca and Wooden Tablets in the Collection of the Brooklyn Museum. (Papyrologica Florentina. XXII.)
Firenze, Gonnelli, 1992, 4Â°, xvi-152 pp., 1 portrait, XLV pll. L. 200.000.
